name: c1
rules: When you take a treasure, you may pay a player 2 coins to take it from that player instead of the Captain.
title: Trevyn

name: c2
rules: When you take coins, take an extra coin.
title: Sophia

name: c3
rules: When the game ends, take an extra treasure from the Captain's hoard.
title: Andrew

name: c4
rules: Once during your turn you may pay 1 coin to the Captain to increase the value of an action by 1.
title: Mike

name: c5
rules: When you swap treasures you may swap 2 instead of 1.
title: Erin

name: c9
rules: You may pay 3 coins to change which of the revealed Greeds are the active Greed.
title: Dan

name: c11
rules: If you have the most coins at the end of the game, gain 5 extra points.
title: James

name: c12
rules: When you swap a treasure, you may pay a player 1 coin to swap a treasure with that player instead of the Captain.
title: Taylor

name: c15
rules: If you have no coins, you may take a coin as part of any action.
title: Berrett

name: c16
rules: You may reveal the next Greed as part of a Meh action.
title: Chad

name: c17
rules: When you count treasures for the purpose of determining who gets shot, you are treated as having 2 fewer treasures.
title: Dustin

name: c19
rules: Your gold coins are worth 3 points each at the end of the game.
title: Isabella

name: c20
rules: When a new Greed is revealed, you may increase the value of an action by 1.
title: Lily
